titleStmt.title: The life of Deval Shewing how he came to be a highway-man;and how he committed several robberies afterwards. Together with his arraignment and condemnation. As also his speech and confession, at the place of execution.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.R. and are to be sold in Westsmithfield, next door to the Dolphin near Hosier-Lane end,

notesStmt.note: From text: "Lewis Deval, alias John Brown"; his true name was Claude Duval.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
